entry.title: Red Flag Warning issued April 07 at 2:17AM MDT until April 07 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS AGAIN TODAY... .Critical fire weather conditions will redevelop by mid morning as winds increase.
